mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SIGHTS (SIGHTS_NAME, CITY, SIGHTS_REGION, SIGHTS_DESCRIPTION, SIGHTS_LOCATION, SIGHTS_HOMEPAGE, SIGHTS_LATITUDE, SIGHTS_LONGITUDE) VALUES (#{sightsName},#{city},#{sightsRegion},#{sightsDescription},#{sightsLocation},#{sightsHomepage},#{sightsLatitude},#{sightsLongitude})
